The real secret to gorgeous skin and impeccable makeup? Expertly paired products. Here, our cheat sheet for beautifully bringing it all together.

Coordinating High-Impact Hues

For a two-toned eyeshadow look thatâ€™s easy to pull off, choose colors from the same family, like blue and purple.

To intensify any shadow, dampen your makeup brush with water, then sweep the color along your lash line.
